text: CosMc's is an American multinational chain of fast food restaurants. It is a spin-off of McDonald's. CosMc's sells sweet snacks and coffee and has been described as McDonald's counter to Starbucks. On July 27, 2023, it was announced that McDonald's was going to start a new spin-off restaurant called CosMc's. On December 6, 2023, McDonald's said that they were going to open their first restaurant in Bolingbrook, Illinois. It opened on December 8. ==References== Category:2023 establishments in the United States Category:American fast food restaurants Category:McDonald's
title: CosMc's
